amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide access to therapeutic listening devices to veterans struggling with mental health related problems, substance abuse, or traumatic brain injury.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4030 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4030 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Mikulski to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4030 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4030 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Mikulski to Amendment SA 3896.
